text: Very friendly and knowledgeable personnel working there. Able to advise and meet my needs!! Zhiqiang was very helpful and patient in educating and explaining each equipment. Upon stepping into the 'mancave', you'll be in awe at all the tools and would wish you own them all. Definitely a worthwhile visit! And yes! You won't leave empty handed!

It is a unique hardware shop. Focused bringing you lifetime premier tools and quality services.

Zhi Qiang and his colleagues were excellent with their services. From online to face they patiently answer all my silly questions and advise me properly.

They even allow trial-test of the tools on some dummy material, which rare case on the red dot.

The only downside is the AI chatbot for inquiries. To simply find out if there are NETS. I've returned three to five other questions before AI can answer my question. ( I had to approach the sales team in the end, to get my answer)
If you're looking for Milwaukee tools, these are your guys!!! Superb customer service and ultra fast delivery! Will def be back for more.

Iâ€™d like to commend the staff at President Trading for their exceptional service. We have purchased several items from them, and have always been impressed with their competitive pricing and availability for immediate pickup. Recently, we encountered an issue with a transfer pump unit. Even though the problem was caused on our end, the team went above and beyond to have the unit serviced. In the meantime, they provided us with an exact loaner unit to ensure minimal disruption to our work. Their commitment to customer satisfaction is truly outstanding. Thank you, President Trading, for your professionalism and support!
Got a hero combo for 500sgd. Sales person (zhi gang) is very helpful and responsive. Highly recomended for hobbist or professionals
